item.title: Components
item.description: Animation   As an example, the following shortcode shows an animation that plays on hover. Formula (KaTeX)   As an example, the following markdown renders two formulas using the KaTeX typesetting library. This is an inline $-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac} \over 2a$ formula This is not an inline formula: $$x = a_0 + \frac{1}{a_1 + \frac{1}{a_2 + \frac{1}{a_3 + a_4}}}$$ $$\forall x \in X, \quad \exists y \leq \epsilon$$
